column5: Can't wait to try my new toy this spring. 80lbs, US2, new Bluetooth iPilot Link. Having it deploy itself should be awesome!
Nice! I need to upgrade soon myself man ..Cant wait to see this beauty in action on your Walleye hunts!
I got i pilot last year. Amazing. Have fun with it You really can launch your boat, have it deploy, hold position offshore while you go park and then call it to shore to get in

Lol..got the call from Gord at QSL Tackle while at work today, that was a long last 2 hours at work. As soon as I was done at work I was on my way to the shop, it was standing upright in the store with a big sticker with my name on it, I ran over to it, the box was taller than me, wrapped my arms around it and stood there hugging it, when I turned around the look on the young shop assistant was priceless , then the look on her face when I pulled out $3600 to pay for it was just as funny!
Very nice motor but wow $3600 must've been tough to swallow!!  I'm sure you'll enjoy it though!!

Thats a sweet purchase Simon!  And I could justify the cost simply by 1.how much time you spend on the water 2. How much of that time is with Jack and/or your wife.  Small price to pay in that perspective!

Thats a sweet purchase Simon!  And I could justify the cost simply by 1.how much time you spend on the water 2. How much of that time is with Jack and/or your wife.  Small price to pay in that perspective!  I justify mine by thinking about the amount of enjoyment my wife has when I leave her at home and go fishing!  She loves the boat almost as much as I do and never sets foot in it!
Im in the "same boat"  The wife is a lil too happy to be rid of me??? plus she knows supper is on me that night!

I'm soooo jealous!! LOL Congrats on the great addition. I want to put the 112lb model on my boat for fishing offshore structure on Erie. I think it would be the kitty's behind out there.  Now I just need that cash...
Sounds amazing. Make sure you give us a report once you've used it for a month.

That's awesome Simon!  Congratulations!  When I first saw the ulterra self deploy I was sold.  That commercial during the Saturday morning fishing shows says it all!  Those 2 young guys on shore are in disbelief.  I love it.
I'm not jealous at all. Really, I'm not. Not one bit.         P.S....I hate you.     LOL  S.
